testcase.name: Amazon searchBox functionality check with valid product
testcase.failure:
Given I am on amazon homePage...............................................failed And I enter "Hand Sanitizer" in searchBox...................................skipped When I click on search Button...............................................skipped Then I should see "Hand Sanitizer" is properly appear.......................skipped But I should not see "mobile" is appear.....................................skipped And I verify "Amazon.com : Hand Sanitizer" in product title.................skipped
